entity.name: Sean Morley
entity.description: AdventureLog is a free, open-source platform for logging, planning, and tracking travel. It’s fully self-hostable, privacy-focused, and designed around interactive mapping. I'm the lead developer and long-term maintainer.

projects.name: AdventureLog
projects.description: A privacy-first travel platform for journaling, tracking, and planning trips. Self-hosted and FOSS, with trip logs, itineraries, maps, GPX support, and media uploads.

channels.description: Monthly or one-time sponsorship via GitHub Sponsors
Quick one-off support — buy the dev a coffee ☕

plans.name: Monthly Support - $10
plans.description: Helps fund ongoing development, maintenance, and new features
